Package rep.scrame.controller.command

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command
    Interface for command handler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddCommand
    An interface to interpret an add command.
    CommandInterpreter
    A command interpreter class that interprets user input into a command invocation.
    DisplayHomeScreenCommand
    Displays the home screen.
    GetCommand
    A command that handles "get" input command.
    HelpCommand
    Displays the help screen once invoked.
    ListCommand
    Lists all registered faculty, faculty members, courses, or students once invoked.
    QuitCommand
    Manages the quitting of the program once invoked by the user.
    UpdateCommand
    Updates a particular course or student.
    ViewCommand
    Manages a detailed view of a particular entity once invoked.
